thread.title: Why the Dodd-Frank Rollback Has Some Small Banks Yawning

author: Ryan Tracy
title: Why the Dodd-Frank Rollback Has Some Small Banks Yawning
text:
Bank lobbyists are pushing Congress to relax regulations for the industry, especially for small lenders. Mary Ann Scully, who runs a community bank in Maryland, is unimpressed.
“It does next to nothing for my bank,” Ms. Scully, chief executive of Baltimore-based Howard Bank, said of the proposed legislation.
The bill would represent the most...
